name: Savoury Herb Gravy
description: You’ve got the mashed spuds, the roast turkey, the green beans and cranberry sauce, but you forgot the gravy. Don’t reach for that salty packaged stuff you grabbed at the store as an afterthought– use Epicure’s healthier version that’s got all the classic herby notes, without the myriad of fillers you don’t want. It’ll be on the table in 6 minutes... it’s all gravy.
preparation: In a bowl, whisk mix into water. Cook 2 min, stir, then cook 2 more min.
In a Multipurpose Pot, whisk mix into water. Bring to a boil, whisking constantly until thickened.

products.name: Savoury Herb Gravy Mix
summary: This better-for-you gravy mix is sure to be a hit at Thanksgiving dinner! A vegan, low-sodium blend that’s still packed with flavour.
